Q.34. SINCE YOU,VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU LISTEN TO NEWS BROADCASTS OVER THE RADIO*    1. ABOUT ONCE A DAY   2. TWO OR MORE TIMES A DAY   3. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK   4. ABOUT ONCE A WEEK   5. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK   0. NO ANSWER ******************************NEWSMAPS************************* P. THE NEWSMAP IS A LARGE POSTER PUT OUT BY THE WAR DEPARTMENT ONCE A WEEK AND POSTED IN ARMY CAMPS. IT HAS MAPS, PICTURES AND NEWS OF THE FIGHTING FRONTS.
